title: Backlight poster designed for a club night
content:
This was a backlight poster design for a club night in Seattle WA.   
   
Typeface(s) used:   
Steelfish   
   
 ![poster image](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417075208im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/930.jpg)
author: funcmedia

comments.content: I like everything but the glow on the text...I would have done it white instead.

I like the white on white thing in the background and how it shows up against the dark gray. Lit from behind, I'm sure it looked really good. I like Steelfish to set a classy mood. Just wondering: Did the club consider identity for 'atmosphere'? An 'atmosphere' logo might be considered.   
   
Overall, I like that we are getting to see design projects and designers posting their work.   
   
Looking forward to seeing your site. ![:)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417075208im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
bj
reminds me a little of Wolfgang Weingart's 'alpine' swiss poster work. Nice except the the type.
